name: Fact or Fiction (SquidRowGames)
description:
Features

  • Fiction Button
  • Fact Button
  • Correct/Wrong Answer Transitions
  • No Menu/Score/Sound

Fact or Fiction is the first released game by SquidRow Games. We know its not pretty, it is strongly encouraged that you download, play and leave feedback. Tell us what you loved about it and Absolutely tell us what you did not like about it.
